timeline.author: enbrain

replies.bodyText: It replaces the color with white obfuscation if it is not in the COLORS field.
replies.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: I can't find the code that checks if something is in the COLORS field. Only I found is String#indexOf taking the field as an argument and this means it searches for the field in the other string.
replies.author: enbrain

timeline.message: Rename the CreditsScreen.COLORS field to OBFUSCATION_PLACEHOLDER
